LOGIN_TEXT: To execute the scenario, you must log in with your DocuSign developer account.
SITE_DESCRIPTION: Discover the power of DocuSign APIs. Experiment with common API calls in an interactive environment that lets you walk through the call parameters and examine the response.
FOOTER_TITLE: Can’t find the API you’re looking for?

ERRORS.500: Server error. Please try again later.
ERRORS.401: Your session has expired. You will be redirected to the login page after closing this window.

PARAMETERS.TITLE: Parameters
PARAMETERS.TEXT: For your own information security, please do not use personal data.
PARAMETERS.EMAIL_NOT_VALID: This email address is not valid
PARAMETERS.FILE_TOO_BIG: The file size should be less than 1 MB

SCENARIO.TITLE: Execute scenario
SCENARIO.LIMITATION: The scenario may be executed up to 10 times.
SCENARIO.DONT_SHOW: Execute without generating API call execution log
SCENARIO.ITERATIONS_VALIDATION_MESSAGE: Please enter a number from 1 to 10

STEP.ENDPOINT_TEXT: The API request is sent to the following endpoint:

STEP.DONT_SHOW_CALLS: Execute without logging API call execution
STEP.NO_REQUEST_BODY: The request does not have a request body
STEP.NO_RESPONSE_BODY: The request returned an empty response
